title: Fireworks (3C32)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Spell. Fellowship: Spot Gandalf to shuffle up to 2 [Gandalf] or up to 2 [Shire] cards from your discard pile into your draw deck.
Lore:	”'The finest rockets ever seen: / they burst in stars of blue and green….'”
Rarity:	C
